reference_a:
@article{beck2022,
  title = {Personalized prediction of behaviors and experiences: {{An}} idiographic person–situation test},
  shorttitle = {Personalized prediction of behaviors and experiences},
  author = {Beck, Emorie D. and Jackson, Joshua J.},
  date = {2022-10},
  journaltitle = {Psychological Science},
  shortjournal = {Psychol Sci},
  volume = {33},
  number = {10},
  pages = {1767--1782},
  issn = {0956-7976, 1467-9280},
  doi = {10.1177/09567976221093307}
}
sampling_scheme: 4x/day every fixed schedule every for hours, starting time chosen by participants
additional_comments: part of larger personality intervention study; one individual (143) had identical duplicate responses, which we removed

features.name: first_beep
features.description: First beep time of the day

features.name: not_optimistic_setback
features.coding:
Stayed optimistic after experiencing a setback.
Likert scale 1 to 5; 1 = Disagree strongly, 3 = Neutral; no opinion 5 = Agree strongly

features.name: talkative
features.coding:
Was talkative.
Likert scale 1 to 5; 1 = Disagree strongly, 3 = Neutral; no opinion 5 = Agree strongly

features.name: not_difficulty_starting
features.coding:
Had difficulty getting started on tasks.
Likert scale 1 to 5; 1 = Disagree strongly, 3 = Neutral; no opinion 5 = Agree strongly

features.name: sad
features.coding:
Often felt sad.
Likert scale 1 to 5; 1 = Disagree strongly, 3 = Neutral; no opinion 5 = Agree strongly

features.name: curious
features.coding:
Was curious about many different things.
Likert scale 1 to 5; 1 = Disagree strongly, 3 = Neutral; no opinion 5 = Agree strongly

features.name: persistent
features.coding:
Was persistent, worked until the task was finished.
Likert scale 1 to 5; 1 = Disagree strongly, 3 = Neutral; no opinion 5 = Agree strongly

features.name: worries
features.coding:
Worried a lot.
Likert scale 1 to 5; 1 = Disagree strongly, 3 = Neutral; no opinion 5 = Agree strongly

features.name: inventive
features.coding:
Was inventive, found clever ways to do things.
Likert scale 1 to 5; 1 = Disagree strongly, 3 = Neutral; no opinion 5 = Agree strongly

features.name: not_starts_arguments
features.coding:
Started arguments with others.
Likert scale 1 to 5; 1 = Disagree strongly, 3 = Neutral; no opinion 5 = Agree strongly

features.name: depressed
features.coding:
Tended to feel depressed, blue.
Likert scale 1 to 5; 1 = Disagree strongly, 3 = Neutral; no opinion 5 = Agree strongly

features.name: not_less_active
features.coding:
Was less active than other people.
Likert scale 1 to 5; 1 = Disagree strongly, 3 = Neutral; no opinion 5 = Agree strongly

features.name: assumes_best
features.coding:
Assumed the best about people.
Likert scale 1 to 5; 1 = Disagree strongly, 3 = Neutral; no opinion 5 = Agree strongly

features.name: not_relaxed
features.coding:
Was relaxed, handled stress well.
Likert scale 1 to 5; 1 = Disagree strongly, 3 = Neutral; no opinion 5 = Agree strongly

features.name: not_rarely_excited
features.coding:
Rarely felt excited or eager.
Likert scale 1 to 5; 1 = Disagree strongly, 3 = Neutral; no opinion 5 = Agree strongly

features.name: fascinated_art
features.coding:
Was fascinated by art, music, or literature.
Likert scale 1 to 5; 1 = Disagree strongly, 3 = Neutral; no opinion 5 = Agree strongly

features.name: assertive
features.coding:
Had an assertive personality.
Likert scale 1 to 5; 1 = Disagree strongly, 3 = Neutral; no opinion 5 = Agree strongly

features.name: not_careless
features.coding:
Was somewhat careless.
Likert scale 1 to 5; 1 = Disagree strongly, 3 = Neutral; no opinion 5 = Agree strongly

features.name: not_finds_fault
features.coding:
Tended to find fault with others.
Likert scale 1 to 5; 1 = Disagree strongly, 3 = Neutral; no opinion 5 = Agree strongly

features.name: not_controls_emotions
features.coding:
Kept their emotions under control.
Likert scale 1 to 5; 1 = Disagree strongly, 3 = Neutral; no opinion 5 = Agree strongly

features.name: values_beauty
features.coding:
Valued art and beauty.
Likert scale 1 to 5; 1 = Disagree strongly, 3 = Neutral; no opinion 5 = Agree strongly

features.name: moody
features.coding:
Was moody, had up and down mood swings.
Likert scale 1 to 5; 1 = Disagree strongly, 3 = Neutral; no opinion 5 = Agree strongly

features.name: not_messy
features.coding:
Left a mess, didn't clean up.
Likert scale 1 to 5; 1 = Disagree strongly, 3 = Neutral; no opinion 5 = Agree strongly

features.name: not_others_charge
features.coding:
Preferred to have others take charge.
Likert scale 1 to 5; 1 = Disagree strongly, 3 = Neutral; no opinion 5 = Agree strongly

features.name: not_poetry_boring
features.coding:
Thought poetry and plays were boring.
Likert scale 1 to 5; 1 = Disagree strongly, 3 = Neutral; no opinion 5 = Agree strongly

features.name: compassionate
features.coding:
Was compassionate, had a soft heart.
Likert scale 1 to 5; 1 = Disagree strongly, 3 = Neutral; no opinion 5 = Agree strongly

features.name: neat_tidy
features.coding:
Kept things neat and tidy.
Likert scale 1 to 5; 1 = Disagree strongly, 3 = Neutral; no opinion 5 = Agree strongly

features.name: enthusiastic
features.coding:
Showed a lot of enthusiasm.
Likert scale 1 to 5; 1 = Disagree strongly, 3 = Neutral; no opinion 5 = Agree strongly

features.name: reliable
features.coding:
Was reliable, could always be counted on.

features.name: not_rude
features.coding:

Likert scale 1 to 5; 1 = Disagree strongly, 3 = Neutral; no opinion 5 = Agree strongly

features.name: tense

features.coding:

features.name: not_quiet
features.coding:

Likert scale 1 to 5; 1 = Disagree strongly, 3 = Neutral; no opinion 5 = Agree strongly

features.name: original
features.coding:
Was original, came up with new ideas.
Likert scale 1 to 5; 1 = Disagree strongly, 3 = Neutral; no opinion 5 = Agree strongly

features.name: dependable
features.coding:
Was dependable, steady.
Likert scale 1 to 5; 1 = Disagree strongly, 3 = Neutral; no opinion 5 = Agree strongly

features.name: not_lazy
features.coding:

Likert scale 1 to 5; 1 = Disagree strongly, 3 = Neutral; no opinion 5 = Agree strongly

features.name: deep_thinker
features.coding:
Was complex, a deep thinker.
Likert scale 1 to 5; 1 = Disagree strongly, 3 = Neutral; no opinion 5 = Agree strongly

features.name: forgiving
features.coding:
Had a forgiving nature.
Likert scale 1 to 5; 1 = Disagree strongly, 3 = Neutral; no opinion 5 = Agree strongly

features.name: helpful
features.coding:
Was helpful and unselfish with others.
Likert scale 1 to 5; 1 = Disagree strongly, 3 = Neutral; no opinion 5 = Agree strongly

features.name: not_emotionally_stable
features.coding:

Likert scale 1 to 5; 1 = Disagree strongly, 3 = Neutral; no opinion 5 = Agree strongly

features.name: polite
features.coding:

features.name: not_difficulty_imagining
features.coding:

features.coding:

features.name: dominant

features.coding:

features.name: outgoing
features.coding:

Likert scale 1 to 5; 1 = Disagree strongly, 3 = Neutral; no opinion 5 = Agree strongly

features.name: not_secure_comfortable
features.coding:
Felt secure, comfortable with self.
Likert scale 1 to 5; 1 = Disagree strongly, 3 = Neutral; no opinion 5 = Agree strongly

features.name: not_avoids_intellectual
features.coding:
Avoided intellectual, philosophical discussions.
Likert scale 1 to 5; 1 = Disagree strongly, 3 = Neutral; no opinion 5 = Agree strongly

features.name: not_disorganized
features.coding:

features.coding:

features.name: mating
features.coding:
Potential romantic partners are present.
1 (= not at all) to 3 (= totally)

features.name: positivity
features.coding:
The situation is pleasant.
1 (= not at all) to 3 (= totally)

features.name: intellect
features.coding:
Deep thinking is required.
1 (= not at all) to 3 (= totally)

features.name: negativity
features.coding:
The situation contains negative feelings (e.g., stress, anxiety, guilt, etc.).
1 (= not at all) to 3 (= totally)

features.name: adversity
features.coding:
Somebody is being threatened, accused, or criticized.
1 (= not at all) to 3 (= totally)

features.name: sociality
features.coding:
Social interactions are possible or required.
1 (= not at all) to 3 (= totally)

features.name: duty
features.coding:
Work has to be done.
1 (= not at all) to 3 (= totally)

features.name: deception
features.coding:
Somebody is being deceived.
1 (= not at all) to 3 (= totally)
